text:
="preserve">João Orlando Duarte da Cunha (30 August 1939 – 14 November 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was born in Ribeirão Preto, São Paulo. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. Cunha was known for being a political ally of President-elect Tancredo Neves. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1975 to 1991.
Cunha died on 14 November 2020 in Ribeirão Preto at the age of 81.
